name: 林鳳儀
objective: 本課程主要研討管理會計，內容包括：（1）導論（2）成本-數量-利潤分析及決策（3）作業基礎管理（4）營業預算（5）財務預算（6）資本預算決策（7）責任會計（8）財務報表分析。
schedule:
1.Financial Statement Introduction 財務報表介紹
2.Chapter 1 & 2 —Management Accounting: A Tool For Decision Making
3.IFRS 國際會計準則
4.Chapter 1 & 2 —Management Accounting: A Tool For Decision Making
5.How Successful Business are Creating Wealth in the New Economy
6.Cost Definition
7.Chapter 3—Activity Cost Analysis and Planning
8.Chapter 4—Profitability Analysis and Planning
9.期中考
10.Chapter 5—Target Costing and Price Planning
11.Chapter 7—Budgetting
12.Chapter 8—Performance 13.Assessment
14.Chapter 9—Strategic Decision Making
15.Chapter 10—Profitability Analysis of Strategic Business 16.Segments/Balanced Scorecard & Strategy Maps
17.Chapter 11— Performance Measurement, Compensation, and Multinational Considerations
18.期末考
